description:
gc: add delete(m, x) but leave in m[x] = 0, false.

The old m[x] = 0, false syntax will be deleted
in a month or so, once people have had time to
change their code (there is a gofix in a separate CL).

messages.text:
Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=72ec19c9f0d9 ***

gc: add delete(m, x) but leave in m[x] = 0, false.

The old m[x] = 0, false syntax will be deleted
in a month or so, once people have had time to
change their code (there is a gofix in a separate CL).

R=ken2
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5265048

subject: code review 5265048: gc: add delete(m, x) but leave in m[x] = 0, false.
